meanings.definition: Giving pleasure or satisfaction; enjoyable or agreeable.
meanings.sent1: The soft music was pleasing to my ears.
meanings.sent2: The colorful flowers were pleasing to look at.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at singing was surprisingly pleasing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pleasing as a warm ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The delicious aroma of the freshly baked cookies was truly pleasing.

meanings.definition: Attractive or appealing in appearance or character.
meanings.sent1: The elegant dress was very pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent2: His charming personality was pleasing to everyone he met.
meanings.sent3: The quirky hat she wore was oddly pleasing.
meanings.sent4: The picturesque view from the mountaintop was pleasing beyond words.
meanings.sent5: The graceful dance of the ballerina was a truly pleasing sight.
